about_the_game:
The Concept is a VR action-adventure set in a laboratory that exists outside the boundaries of time. In this enigmatic setting, an unknown artifact has triggered a series of events that defy the laws of reality. Players will navigate through this surreal environment, solving intricate riddles and engaging in realistic, physics-based gameplay.

  • Advanced Physics: The game features a robust physics engine that allows for creative and immersive interactions with the environment. Every object behaves according to consistent physical rules, encouraging players to experiment and explore.

  • Combat: Engage in dynamic combat scenarios where you can use a variety of weapons and environmental elements to your advantage. Whether it’s melee combat, firearms, or setting up physics traps, the possibilities are endless.

  • Weapons Galore: Equip yourself with a diverse arsenal of weapons, including traditional firearms, melee weapons, and experimental tools. Each weapon is designed to interact with the game’s physics in unique ways.

  • Immersive Interaction: Experience hyper-realistic interactions with objects and environments, making every action feel tangible and impactful.

  • Intriguing Story: Uncover the mysteries of the artifact and the laboratory as you delve deeper into the narrative. Explore the hidden secrets and understand the true nature of the experiments conducted here.

  • Realistic Body Presence: The game use special body IK systems, providing a realistic and immersive experience as you interact with the virtual world.

    Important Notice: VR Compatibility

    We strive to provide the best VR experience across all supported headsets. However, we have identified a compatibility issue with certain Windows Mixed Reality (WMR) headsets, specifically the Samsung HMD Odyssey. Users with these headsets may experience difficulties with movement using VR controllers.

    Our game supports the following VR platforms:

    • Meta Quest (tested on Quest 3 through Steam VR and Meta Quest Link)

    • HTC Vive (tested on HTC Vive Pro)

    • Valve Index (no known issues)

    • Windows Mixed Reality (with noted exceptions)

    We recommend checking your headset's compatibility before downloading the demo. We are actively working to resolve these issues and appreciate your understanding and patience.

Note: Extremely rare, but if you encounter issues with jumping or reaching objects, it may be due to automatic height calibration. To fix this, open the game menu using your controller, select "Calibrate Player Height," and try again.

content_descriptors.notes: This game features intense and realistic physics-based interactions with enemies. Players will encounter a variety of disturbing and lifelike adversaries that can be engaged and eliminated in numerous violent ways, depending on the player’s actions. The enemies will invade the player’s space, creating a tense and immersive experience. Due to the graphic nature of these encounters, including potentially disturbing imagery and scenarios, this game is intended for mature audiences only.
